    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arrow-Catching Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=317)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This remarkable [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 10, HP 60, BT 30) is carved with images of overlapping fletched arrows.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per minute; **Trigger** A ranged weapon Strike targets a creature within 15 feet of you when you have this shield raised, and the attacker has not yet rolled their attack;  **Effect** The triggering Strike targets you instead of its normal target. If it hits, you gain the effects of the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Arrow-Catching Shield
